00014 #include "xdotwriter.h"
00015 #include <fstream>
00016 #include "xitemnode.h"
00017 #include "xlistnode.h"
00018 
00019 XDotWriter::XDotWriter(const shared_ptr<XNode> &root, std::ofstream &ofs)
00020     : m_root(root), m_ofs(ofs), m_unnamedcnt(0)
00021 {
00022     ASSERT(ofs.good());
00023     ofs << "/* KAME2 measurement configuration file" << std::endl
00024         << "* Automatically created. KAME version. " VERSION << std::endl
00025         << "* date: " << XTime::now().getTimeStr() << std::endl
00026         << "*/" << std::endl;
00027 }
00028 XDotWriter::~XDotWriter()
00029 {
00030     m_ofs.flush();
00031 }
00032 void 
00033 XDotWriter::write()
00034 {
00035     m_ofs << "digraph "
00036           << "G" //(const char *)m_root->getName().c_str()
00037           << " {"
00038           << std::endl;
00039     m_ofs << "node [shape=box,style=filled,color=green];" << std::endl;
00040           
00041     write(m_root);
00042     m_ofs << "}"
00043           << std::endl;
00044 }
00045 void 
00046 XDotWriter::write(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00047 {
00048     if(std::find(m_nodes.begin(), m_nodes.end(), node) == m_nodes.end()) {
00049         m_ofs << "obj_" << (uintptr_t)node.get()
00050               << " [label=\"" << node->getName()
00051               << "\"]" << std::endl;
00052         m_nodes.push_back(node);
00053     }
00054 //    shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> vnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(node);
00055         
00056 //    shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> lnode = dynamic_pointer_cast<XListNodeBase>(node);
00057     int unnamed = 0;
00058     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_root->children());
00059     if(list) { 
00060         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00061             shared_ptr<XNode> child = *it;
00062            
00063             if(child->getName().empty()) {
00064                 unnamed++;
00065             }
00066             else {
00067                 m_ofs << "obj_" << (uintptr_t)child.get()
00068                       << " -> "
00069                       << "obj_" << (uintptr_t)node.get()
00070                       << std::endl;
00071                 write(child);
00072             }
00073         }
00074     }
00075     if(unnamed) {
00076         m_unnamedcnt++;
00077         m_ofs << "unnamedobj_" << (int)m_unnamedcnt
00078               << " [label=\"" << (const char*)QString("%1 obj.").arg(unnamed).toUtf8().data()
00079               << "\"]" << std::endl;
00080         m_ofs << "unnamedobj_" << (int)m_unnamedcnt
00081               << " -> "
00082               << "obj_" << (uintptr_t)node.get()
00083               << std::endl;
00084     }
00085 }
